comment._content: Lalla Vandervelde (note correct spelling), wife of the Belgian statesman Emile Vandervelde (en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emile_Vandervelde), see New-York tribune., September 27, 1914, Page 9 (with photo) The Day book., September 24, 1914, LAST EDITION, Image 27 (with photo) The Washington herald., December 13, 1914, Society Section, Page 2 f, column 5

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: Thanks, B-59.  We'll update Lalla's record.
